trans-unit.source: The abstract base class for proxies to well-known objects that were generated by the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5).
<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.RemotingClientProxy> provides access to the frequently used properties for Soapsuds-generated proxies that point to well-known objects (XML Web services).
Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.RemotingClientProxy"></xref>.
The transparent proxy inside the remoting client proxy object.
Indicates the type of the object that the current proxy represents.
The <xref:System.Type> class type of the object that the current proxy represents.
Indicates the URL of the object that the current proxy represents.
The URL of the object that the current proxy represents.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the automatic handling of server redirects is enabled.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the automatic handling of server redirects is enabled.
Internal.
Automatically configures the proxy by loading the channels, if they are not already loaded and creating the proxy.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> class type of the object that the current proxy represents.
The URL of the object that the current proxy represents.
Internal.
Connects the proxy to the remoting channel that is specified by the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.RemotingClientProxy.Url"></xref> property.
This property is not currently implemented.
The property returns `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The cookies for the current proxy.
Gets or sets the domain name to be used for basic authentication and digest authentication.
For more information on remoting security and authentication methods, see [Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9574262c-d4b1-41c5-8600-24ff147c0add).
The name of the domain to use for basic authentication and digest authentication.
This property is not currently implemented.
The property throws a <xref href="System.NotSupportedException"></xref>.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the handling of cookies received from the server is enabled.
Gets or sets the password to use for basic authentication and digest authentication.
For more information on remoting security and authentication methods, see [Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9574262c-d4b1-41c5-8600-24ff147c0add).
The password to use for basic authentication and digest authentication.
Gets or sets the base URL to the server to use for requests.
The base URL to the server to use for requests.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether preauthentication of requests is enabled.
A Boolean value that indicates whether preauthentication of requests is enabled.
Gets or sets the name of the proxy server to use for requests.
The name of the proxy server to use for requests.
Gets or sets the port number of the proxy server to use for requests.
The port number of the proxy server to use for requests.
Gets or sets the time-out in milliseconds to use for synchronous calls.
The default value of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.RemotingClientProxy.Timeout%2A> property is -1, and indicates that a time-out never occurs (infinite time-out).
The time-out in milliseconds to use for synchronous calls.
Gets or sets the base URL to the server to use for requests.
The base URL to the server to use for requests.
Gets or sets the user agent HTTP header for the request.
The user agent HTTP header for the request.
Gets or sets the user name to send for basic authentication and digest authentication.
For more information on remoting security and authentication methods, see [Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9574262c-d4b1-41c5-8600-24ff147c0add).
The user name to send for basic authentication and digest authentication.
